Reviews.Title: Incredible phone, bad seller
Reviews.Author: Charissa
Reviews.Content: I did NOT receive a 32GB model, instead I was sent a 16GB one.If I wanted a 16GB one I could have got it cheaper than what I paid for this so called 32GB phone.

Reviews.Title: Double Check details
Reviews.Author: n rasavongseuk
Reviews.Content: These Galaxy S4's gt i9500 all work well on a 4G network, butu they do not have complete 4G  compatiblity, only HSP+  and other foreign networks, but its good enough for day to day, and obviously to take overseas.

Reviews.Title: Over priced for same value with other phones
Reviews.Author: Lizzie
Reviews.Content: Same phone function capabilities, too much money placed on it. Waste of resources. Doesn't worth the cost place on it.
